price: 58. Ma sinna kan indhaha la’ iyo kan wax arka, iyo kuwa (Xaqa) rumeysan oo samaha fala iyo kuwa xumaanta fala. Wax yar weeye intaad waantowdaan.
arabic: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡبَصِيرُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَلَا ٱلۡمُسِيٓءُۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā yastawī al-aʿmā wal-baṣīru wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti walā al-musīu qalīlan mā tatadhakkarūna
